Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or serve a unique purpose in your life. Considering its outstanding features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and dedication we've put into ensuring its excellence. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
